Title: Relates to the use of smart access systems and the information that may be gathered from such systems
Summary: Relates to limitations on the use of smart access systems; restricts information that may be gathered on lessees, tenants, owners or guests.
LawCode: Add ยง50-b, Mult Dwell L; add ยง130-a, Mult Res L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple dwelling law and the multiple residence law, in relation to the use of smart access systems and the information that may be gathered from such systems
